review: Doctor understood the situation and gave good treatment. Counselled well what is the exact condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to express my deepest gratitude to the entire team of GreenMed hospital, for saving mine and my baby boy's life during an emergency c-section. They have well qualified and experienced team of doctors and nurses.Dr. Keerthana Reddy, Dr. Ganesh, Dr. Shashidhar Thakur, anticipated all the possible challenges that may be faced and were prepared with the treatment plan. This helped me and my baby stabilize and survive the surgery. I was taken care off like a baby, until I recovered and got discharged. Doctor Shashidhar Thakur took care of my premature baby and made sure he is stable. I would like to Thank the most polite and experienced staff of the hospital Dr. Shiva Prasad, Dr. Keerti, Dr. Suchitra... Nursing staff : Kavitha, Sarita, Sameena, Shiva, the entire nursing team (missed a couple of names) and help staff. The hospital is very clean and tidy. *** ** *** **** ********** that focuses on recovery of your health. Highly recommended üëçüëçüòäüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ******* He is very simple and gentle in his behavior. He will give sufficient time to each patient. He cares the baby and studies the baby to give the treatment accurate  We can freely interact with the doctor. During my delivery period I dint find the commercia nature in him.

He suggests the best tests that need to be taken for newborn to not to have problems in future.I suggest to visit the doctor and greenmed hospital  to have hassle free treatment and much needed care you would need during your newborn delivery and care .

Dr. Sashi is one of gem doctors i have met in my lifetime.. he never advised any antibiotics to my kids. He is so patient and kind enough to address the issues.. 
I personally thank Dr. Sashi for helping us in each and every aspect üòä
Thank you once again Doctor

Dr.Shashidhar is a kind ,humble and nice human being.He is sincere ,caring and a skilled padetrician..Dr.Shashi is anytime available on call for seeking medical advice.
The concern shown makes everything better for the patient for faster recovery.
His services to the patients is much appeaciated.

As a mom of preterm baby , I was always worried about my child's  health. But thanks to Dr. Shashidhar who is 
a  well experienced pediatrician. He gives his all attention and time making sure that all my queries are answered. His kind personality put me at ease from our first interaction  5 years ago.I highly recommend every mother to  visit him .

** ********* ** *** **** ** **** ** ***** ** ** ******** * i have been visiting him since 3 years, when my first child was born and till date , i can't think of anyone else other than him , i feel truly blessed to get such a friendly approach with smiling face always .. even my kids love him so much becoz of the way he treat them in a friendly way ..  his diagnose is always perfect all the time that too without any tests and only done with few medicines  .. tq sir tq so much for always being there for my children in any time ... I would recommend you for  anyone parents looking for a pediatrician..
